body: Similar to a visual trigger, the trap incorporates a camera or other visual and audio recording device. Electric eyes typically have darkvision to a range of 120 feet, low-light vision, and a Perception bonus of +15. This trigger adds +1 to the trap's CR and +5 to its crafting DC.
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Hazards/Timeworn Technology Glitches/Traps and Technology/Electric Eyes
name: Electric Eyes
